notes: Well-maintained modern apartment with open-plan living area, stylish kitchen with breakfast bar, and at least 2-3 bedrooms with hardwood floors. The apartment is clean with modern fixtures, recessed/track lighting, and air conditioning. Baby safety considerations: the balcony visible in bedroom 3 has railings that appear adequate, glass coffee table has sharp corners, and bar stools near the kitchen island could be a climbing hazard. Good natural light in bedrooms with windows.
